name: The Final Message to the Wildhammer
tooltip:
The Final Message to the WildhammerLevel 50

Otho Moji'ko at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands wants you to travel to Aerie Peak in the western region of the Hinterlands and place the Final Message to the Wildhammer by the well in the center of town. Return to him once this task is complete.

Beware of angry Wildhammer dwarves and unruly members of the Alliance.

Requirements:
- Message to the Wildhammer Delivered
